entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as a threat to Harry Potter. (How long it would take Voldemort to get to this place...)

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: A Snatcher who is leading the group that has captured Harry Potter. (He roared triumphantly. "We've got Potter!" Greyback said.)

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, being captured by the Snatchers. (They've got Potter! Harry Potter!)

entities.name: snatchers
entities.description: A group of people who are working for Voldemort and have captured Harry Potter. (One of the Snatchers strode to the gates...)

entities.name: albino peacock
entities.description: A ghostly white shape seen by Harry above him as he is being dragged through the gates. (He saw a ghostly white shape above him...)

relationships.description: Greyback and his men have captured Harry Potter, as stated by Greyback. (We've got Potter! Harry Potter!)
Voldemort is working through the Snatchers, including Greyback, to capture Harry Potter. (How long it would take Voldemort to get to this place...)
